title: Hello From the Developer
content:
Hey there! Vishesh Here. 
This is the first post on the site. 
I hope you enjoy using this site!

title: Don't make dumb usernames
content:
Prev here has decided to change his username to "Prevy Wevy".
This is a horrible name.
Do not create accounts with stupid usernames.
Please.

title: Don't use guessable passwords
content:
Impersonation is a real thing!
Use strong passwords and save them.
Please don't use "password".
The security is of no use if you use such passwords.

title: This is a quick test
content: I am testing a new hosting platform.

Do not smoke!!!

title: What do you think of the DMs?
content:
What do you guys think of the _all new_ DM functionality? \
Have you tried it out yet? \
Go find it in the `profile` tab! \
_Note: You must have a valid account to use the DM functionality._

title: Hello all
content: Hello, this is very cool and I love this blog. This has so much interesting information. Kudos to the developer.
